response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. To make this opportunity even more attractive, I propose a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to reward early adopters like yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
